thebioniclefan001,"2012-01-23T17:53:14.74Z","bigger is always better","

While at my local target i stumbled upon Rocka and Splitface the first thing i noticed was the price 12.99 usually heros are 7.99 and the second was the plastic bag that he was in i geuss lego made another money-saving idea.


Building expirience

The new hero factory build is as simple as usual snapping and clicking as usual.But they brought back alot of old bionicle pieces too like the chains and the
column3: joints on the cross-bow.Also there are several new pieces like the shield, the shoulder pad, the gun,the thornaxx launcher piece ,the chest piece, the hero core,the&nbsp
column4: Gatling chain and the hand cuffs.&nbsp

column1:
• Con 1-Silver hand
  • Con 2-Hero core is white while head is green
  • Con 3-Grey upper-leg limbs(NOTE: Splitface has black upper-leg limbs)


Over-all due to to the gold pieces and the return of the glatorian heads this set is really good well worth 12.99.i give it 9/10
Gresh_Star,"2012-06-25T01:21:35.533Z","The best Hero So far...","<span style=""font-weight: bold
column3:
>Package

The new bags are cool. They are very useful, you can keep Lego parts in them.
column6:
>Parts

A lot of cool parts. Also a lot of clear parts. But they could put another shoulder armor and golden hand.
column7:
>Building

I had fun building Rocka. It was interesting.
column8:
>Pros and Cons

Pros:

Looks just amazing.

A lot of cool parts.

Clear parts with holograms.

Ball shooter.

Hero cuffs.


Cons:

Another shoulder armor would be nice.

Silver hand.
